author: ArvinLee
title: Mixed feeling
text:
Booked 4 rooms for 4 nights directly thru their websitr. But all of sudden they cancel the reservation without telling the reason why. So i had to call the call centre in Spain to have them rebooked me the room even at a slightly higher price, which wasnt a problem. The correpondence with Paola from the Melia Vendome was helpful.
LocAtion was great. Right in the shopping area with lots of great restaurants.
Checking in was fast, easy
The first impression of the lobby was nicely decorated and cozy.
Bellboy was friendly and helpful.
Room: decent size for parisian standard, along with water kettle, safe deposit box . Minibar. The room was warm, so had to open the window
Somehow the fire alarm was covered with plastic wrap. And the ceiling cracked.
bathroom pretty spacious bathtub and all.
Breakfast: hotel standard, egg stations, cold cuts, fruits and juice. Milk and cereals also breads. However the staffs seemed tired and not excited in serving the guests.
Major let down: WIFI. Dont count on it. Super slow. I mean slow even slower than in rural third world country i went .
